body_text: What is the cause of the zombie outbreak? In the first episode from the anime Zombie's already exist. And after finishing the anime there's still no explanation about their origins. Is the outbreak cause already revealed in the manga?

Is Highschool of the Dead on hiatus again? I was really happy when I heard that HoTD would be continued. And even happier when the first new chapter actually came. but now after several months of waiting there still has been no other chapter. So my question is, has HoTD gone on hiatus again ?
Does anyone know what happened to H.O.T.D? I really like the storyline, and I kinda miss it since the series hasn't released a new chapter in a long time.

where is chapter 31 of H.O.T.D? I have been waiting a long time so i checked the internet but all the answers are from a year or two ago.
What happened to the manga writer?i have checked the internet but the information there isn't what i was hoping to see
